PM Modi Meets Film Stars To Mark Gandhi's 150th Birth Anniversary & People Are Not Sure Why

PM Modi Meets Film Stars To Mark Gandhi's 150th Birth Anniversary & People Are Not Sure Why

Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Saturday hosted the members of film fraternity at his official residence,7, Lok Kalyan Marg, New Delhi. It was star-studded affair. From Shah Rukh Khan and Aamir Khan to Rajkumar Hirani and Kangana Ranaut, he interacted with the film fraternity and also discussed initiatives to mark the 150th anniversary of Mahatama Gandhi.

Twitter

“The power of creativity is immense and it is essential to harness this spirit of creativity for our nation. Several people from the world of films and television have been doing great work when it comes to popularising the ideals of Mahatma Gandhi,” he was quoted as saying.

The power of creativity is immense and it is essential to harness this spirit of creativity for our nation. Several people from the world of films and television have been doing great work when it comes to popularising the ideals of Mahatma Gandhi: PM @narendramodi — PMO India (@PMOIndia) October 19, 2019

With that, PM Modi also released a cultural video with the theme 'Change Within' to mark the 150th birth anniversary of Mahatma Gandhi.

"The film fraternity comes together to pay tributes to Mahatma Gandhi! #ChangeWithin is an excellent effort, which will add momentum towards ensuring Gandhi Ji's message reverberates far and wide. It will also inspire citizens to take up causes dear to Bapu," Modi tweeted.
